Text: RE Reliant Cc Eric I do not have a concern about the credit quality of Reliant concerning this transaction Enron does have performance risk but it seems minimal and I would recommend that we prepay Reliant the Regards Tom Moran Original Message From Boyt Eric Sent Monday February AM To Mann Kay Moran Tom Cc Germany Chris Sewell Doug Schneider Chip Subject Reliant KayTom I need legal and credit signoff for ENA to prepay Reliant for gas needed to perform under the City of Tallahassee contract approx MM in the money to Enron The prepay would be for mmbtuday x days x Gas Daily appox This would give us days worth of swing gas prepaid with Reliant Questions Are you concerned about Credit Are you concerned about the risk they may take our money and not perform by claiming an offset against other monies owed by ENA Kay where can I find you to get you the contract to review Please get back to us today as we need to get the Cash Approval Sheet to the credit committee this afternoon Thanks so much Eric PS Chris is also working on another backup supplier for this deal

RE Netting Agreement Cc In order of magnitude I would suggest Dreyfus Navajo Unocal Richardson tm Original Message From Viverito John Sent Friday November AM To Mendoza Nidia Williams Jason R Credit Cc Cook Mary St Clair Carol Heard Marie Flores Nony Moran Tom Aronowitz Alan Subject RE Netting Agreement NidiaJay With regard to the following requests please let me know if I should be carrying these forward i Louis Dreyfuss request for NGL Master Purchase and Sale Agreement ii Richardson request for NGL payment netting iii Navajo Refining Company request for crude payment netting and iv Unocal Energy Trading Inc request for crude payment netting Thanks John Original Message From Mendoza Nidia Sent Friday November AM To Williams Jason R Credit Cc Cook Mary St Clair Carol Heard Marie Viverito John Flores Nony Moran Tom Subject FW Netting Agreement Jay Unocal Energy Trading Inc is interested in a payment netting agreement for crude oil transactions Attached is our crude oil netting agreement with their comments Thanks Nidia x Original Message From Adamec Mike ENRON Sent Thursday November AM To Mendoza Nidia Subject Netting Agreement Nidia Here is a worked up version of your netting agreement We have made some minor changes and filled in the blanks in regard to UETI If it OK proceed to the final version for signature Thanks ERACNettingAgmtrevmrmdoc Mike Adamec Corporate Credit Manager Unocal Corporation Southwest Freeway Sugar Land TX PH FX EM Practice random acts of kindness ERACNettingAgmtrevmrmdoc File ERACNettingAgmtrevmrmdoc

RE Bonneville Power Administrationonly restriction is coming from our cautious power credit team wanting to only sell to BPA at this time Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Thursday March PM To Guidroz Walter Moran Tom Subject Bonneville Power Administration Taking a look at BPA from the list I noticed that weve got them opened up for west coast power only on the offer and not the bid I have no notes that they are restricted in that manner Whats the scoop Marcus do you see any reason they should be restricted to the offer side
FW EOL approvals see attached

RE Ontario Power Generation Cc Can we accomplish that by you initiating a change to their current trading profile in Profile Manager Regards tm Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Wednesday March PM To Sever Stephanie Lees Lisa Cc Nettelton Marcus Moran Tom Guidroz Walter Subject Ontario Power Generation Per conv a minute ago with Marcus Christi Nicolay in the Regulatory Group just checked and Ontario Power Generation does not have a FERC marketing license That leaves them to buying US power only both east west OK Please make this change immediately Thanks
FYIYou will need to submit of your first backups prior to being able to take off the remainder of the week tm
EOL approvals Cc attached

RE Daishowa Cc Curry is your man Tana Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Tuesday April PM To Bradford William S Brackett Debbie Rohauer Tanya Reves Brant Ngo Tracy Campbell Lesli Espinoza Veronica Radous Paul Lebrocq Wendi Diamond Russell Moran Tom Sacks Edward Mendoza Nidia Conwell Wendy Vanek Darren Johnson Rudwell Subject Daishowa I got a call from National Bank of Canada and they said that we purchased t he referenced company and what did we intend to do with the trade between NBC and Daishowa Anyone know anything about this
FW EOL approvals see attached Regards Tom Moran
EOL Approvals see attached Regards Tom Moran

Engage Entities Open for All US Phys Power Cc Could you please expedite the following amendment the profiles of Engage Energy America LLC and Engage Energy Canada LP as soon as possible this morning Paul Radous is opening both of these entities up to trade all US East and West Phys Power products and I have made the changes in Profile Manager Thanks for your help tm May Paul Radous Engage Energy America LLC US Y Amended Amend profile to allow US East and West Power Phys for months May Paul Radous Engage Energy Canada LP Canada Y Amended Amend profile to allow US East and West Power Phys for months

Petrobras America Inc Cc please try and expedite this amendment request for Petrobras America Inc We would like to give them the ability to trade Fin Swaps for Unl Gasoline HeatingOil and MTBE by Monday AM Thanks in advance for your help Regards tm CP ID Counterparty Name Country ESP Enron ID Comments Petrobras America Inc USA Y Amended Amend profile to include Financial trading of US Unl No and MTBE Fin Swaps with a month tenor

BP Name Change Cc I spoke with John Weiss BP Exploration Oil Inc cpid and he informed me that effective October they will be changing the name of the company The new entity is going to be BP Products North America Inc We will need to coordinate BP Products coming on EOL and BP Exploration being shut down From the legal standpoint we have a master with BP Exploration Oil Inc and need to know how that will follow the new company tm
RE All Newsprint Customers are to have at least a Threemonth Tenor Cc TanaSam Call me when you get this and I will explain Regards tm

Edison Mission Marketing Trading Inc Amendment Cc Edison Mission Marketing Trading Inc has provided Enron with a letter of credit through January and Wendy is now comfortable in amending their EOL profile We will open their access to trade US East and US West Physical Power with a month tenor When we enter the calendar month of November this tenor will be decreased to month and when we enter the calendar month of December this tenor will be decreased to months If possible could we please have this amended for trading beginning of the day on Monday I have made the requisite credit changes in Profile Manager Thanks in advance tm

Farewell Cc email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email If you will allow me to quote Sinatras My Way And now the end is near and so I face the final curtain Just a quick note to let you all know that tomorrow Thursday March th will be my last day here at Enron as I move further down the alphabet to a credit role at Entergy Corp I will forward my new information as it becomes available but for now you can reach me at Home Phone andor Home email I wish that it could have been a sweeter ride for all of us but it was not in the cards I have enjoyed working with you all and am a better person for the experience Best of luck to everybody Tom Moran PS Bonus parting points to anyone that knows who wrote My Way

RE LCs Cc Energy Service Providers LLC was set for payment of on I have asked Mark Leskowitz to verify that payment was received The LC is associated with domestic crude deliveries to Trafigura AG ERAC has shorted Trafigura on the deliveries and on a net basis we owe them money on We should let this lc expire Regards tm Original Message From St Clair Carol Sent Wednesday December PM To Moran Tom Cc Aronowitz Alan Gresham Wayne Robison Michael A Shackleton Sara Sager Elizabeth Subject LCs Importance High Tom EGLI is holding a LC that expires covering a deal with Energy Service Providers LLC According to our records this deal has terminated Have we been paid Are we owed anything Would we have any grounds for drawing prior to the expiry date ERAC is also holding a LC that expires on What is the status of this deal Carol St Clair EB phone fax cell phone pager home fax

Vitol YC Cc Mark Could you please check to see if we ever got paid by Vitol under contract YC The contract was a sale by Enron Clean Fuels Company to Vitol SA Inc for bbls of MTBE gal We are currently holding a letter of credit for this transaction which expires on Regards tm

RE Letters of Credit Cc Sara We will take a look at the lcs this today tm Original Message From Shackleton Sara Sent Friday January PM To Moran Tom Cc Hendry Brent Subject Letters of Credit Tom Time is running out for the month of January and we need your list and copies of LCs expiring at the end of the month as well as positions to determine possible draws Are you handling this Sara Shackleton Enron Wholesale Services Smith Street EBa Houston TX Ph Fax

RE ENA exposures for FXrate desk Cc Can we get together on Thursday morning to discuss Original Message From Shackleton Sara Sent Wednesday December PM To Moran Tom Cc Glover Sheila Carrington Clara Subject ENA exposures for FXrate desk Tom Further to my voice mail attached is a short list of FXrate desk financial counterparties We will need an aggregate ENA exposure before attempting to negotiate ENAs inthemoney positions on a commodity by commodity basis ie the FXrate exposure in particular I will speak with Clara Carrington about segregation of the terminated trades from their books Id like to sit down with you and Sheila Glover as soon as possible to strategize Thanks Sara File FX Rate Desk Terminationsdoc Sara Shackleton Enron Wholesale Services Smith Street EBa Houston TX Ph Fax

RE ENA exposures for FXrate desk Cc will be fine Original Message From Shackleton Sara Sent Wednesday December PM To Moran Tom Cc Glover Sheila Carrington Clara Subject RE ENA exposures for FXrate desk How about on the th floor Sara Original Message From Moran Tom Sent Wednesday December PM To Shackleton Sara Cc Glover Sheila Carrington Clara Subject RE ENA exposures for FXrate desk Can we get together on Thursday morning to discuss Original Message From Shackleton Sara Sent Wednesday December PM To Moran Tom Cc Glover Sheila Carrington Clara Subject ENA exposures for FXrate desk Tom Further to my voice mail attached is a short list of FXrate desk financial counterparties We will need an aggregate ENA exposure before attempting to negotiate ENAs inthemoney positions on a commodity by commodity basis ie the FXrate exposure in particular I will speak with Clara Carrington about segregation of the terminated trades from their books Id like to sit down with you and Sheila Glover as soon as possible to strategize Thanks Sara File FX Rate Desk Terminationsdoc Sara Shackleton Enron Wholesale Services Smith Street EBa Houston TX Ph Fax

RE KochBjorn and I just called Michael Hoffman Chief Risk Officer and Kevin Belknap Credit Waiting for callbacks Original Message From Nowlan Jr John L Sent Mon AM To Shankman Jeffrey A Bradford William S Moran Tom Cc Subject Koch Koch commercial willing to do ring trade million bbls kochconagra and koch creditbellknapp killed the deal can you guys follow up

RE SemoraKochCoastalAll Louise has is the file I just sent you Jeff I will send you the entire November position as I understand it Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Friday October PM To Moran Tom Subject RE SemoraKochCoastal Whatever youve given to Louise with any EGM counterparties Id like so were all on the same page Jeff Original Message From Moran Tom Sent Friday October PM To Shankman Jeffrey A Subject RE SemoraKochCoastal Jeff Let me send you what I pieced together from Joel Bennetts position at COB last night my discussions with Peggy Rathmell and her slates Give me just a couple of minutes tm Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Friday October PM To Moran Tom Subject RE SemoraKochCoastal What about all the other reports for any EGM counterparty Id like those as well Original Message From Moran Tom Sent Friday October PM To Shankman Jeffrey A Cc Brackett Debbie R Subject SemoraKochCoastal Jeff Attached are the November WTI Cushing positions for Sempra Koch and Coastal File SempraKochCoastal Nov Cushingxls

December Physical Crude Recap Cc Bill To recap our meeting concerning the December physical crude position ERAC will not be physically exercising any of the P Put options The physical position is roughly short and Don and Rob will be trying to purchase bbls and balance positions with the following cps o Coastal o Dynegy o Duke o Diamond o Bayoil Regards tm
REIm in the back corner near Doug Leachs team Desk Cell Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Mon AM To Moran Tom Hagelmann Bjorn Cc Subject I cant find you guys over here

Hess Update Cc Jeff I spoke with Steve Semlitz this afternoon He basically wants to bilaterally take our thresholds to zero on the ENAMaster with HETCO I informed Steve that I would run the concept by Bill Bradford Bill owns this issue and has spoken to Hess several times today Grim TrevinoJohn Butala Regards tm Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Friday October PM To Buy Rick Bradford William S Cc Moran Tom Subject I phoned Steve Semlitz at Hess Hetco He thinks we owe them and told him we were addressing all issues and I or Tom Moran would get back with him today They are still trading with us but want to take margin threshold to
EOL and Clickpaper Approvals for Cc Please see attached Regards tm
